articles.description: The chancellor and her brute are on the lam in the HBO miniseries' sendoff
articles.content: The anthem of The Regime was, from its very first episode, Chicagos If You Leave Me Now. If youll recall, that was the song chancellor Elena Vernham (Kate Winslet) serenaded her husband with at a lav… [+8537 chars]

articles.author: Scott Bryan
articles.title: ‘Mr Bates vs The Post Office’: The U.K. Drama That Changed British Legal History Comes to Masterpiece on PBS - Variety
articles.description: After 'Mr Bates vs The Post Office' premiered in the U.K. in January, the scandal dominated headlines and changed the law — now it's coming to PBS.
articles.content:
There is a moment in “Mr Bates vs. the Post Office” that makes you as a viewer go “it cannot be real” — only for you then to remind yourself that what you are watching is a true story.
